resources.name: Get stats
resources.description:
This route gets stats from today and last 6 days. And also gets weekly and monthly data

### only for admins

```response:200
	"ok": true,
	"days": [
		"2022-6-23",
		"2022-6-22",
		"2022-6-21",
		"2022-6-20",
		"2022-6-19",
		"2022-6-18"
	],
	"posts": [
		1,
		2,
		3,
		4,
		5,
		6
	],
	"exchanges": [
		1,
		2,
		3,
		4,
		5,
		6
	],
	"weeklyPosts": 0,
	"weeklyExchanges": 1,
	"monthlyPosts": 12,
	"monthlyExchanges": 4
```

resources.name: Create admin account
resources.description:
This route is used to create an admin

### Only superadmin can create admins

```response:200
{
	"ok": true,
	"admin": {
		"username": "adminxmerca",
		"password": null,
		"role": "admin",
		"status": 1,
		"_id": "62a7b992fa567e0cfe41e847",
		"createdAt": "2022-06-13T22:26:26.185Z",
		"updatedAt": "2022-06-13T22:26:26.185Z",
		"__v": 0
	}
}
```

```response:401
{
	"ok": false,
	"message": "Unauthorized",
	"rolesNeeded": [
		"superadmin"
	]
}
```

resources.name: Get admins
resources.description:

```response:200
}
```

resources.name: Get posts
resources.description:
This route get all posts.

## Restrictions
Posts must be VISIBLE and UNBLOCKED.

## Params  
page: Specifies the number of page to request in order to use pagination.

```response:200
{
	"ok": true,
	"count": 1,
	"page": 1,
	"pages": 1,
	"posts": [
		post: {
			"_id": "62a7c0e25c5e9bf2ecb35afa",
			"user_id": "62a7c05a5c5e9bf2ecb35af6",
			"title": "Mi primer post en recycluster!",
			"category": "Plastico",
			"description": "La mejor app del mundo",
			"image": "./uploads/62a7c05a5c5e9bf2ecb35af6/2022-06-13T22-57-38.252Zminions.jpg",
			"status": 1,
			"visibility": 1,
			"history": [],
			"createdAt": "2022-06-13T22:57:38.256Z",
			"updatedAt": "2022-06-13T22:57:38.256Z",
			"__v": 0
		},
		"user": {
			"_id": "62a7c05a5c5e9bf2ecb35af6",
			"username": "carlosxmerca",
			"email": "eduarmercado4@gmail.com",
			"points": 500,
			"phone": "7788-7778",
			"role": "user",
			"status": 1,
			"visibility": 1,
			"createdAt": "2022-06-13T22:55:22.990Z",
			"updatedAt": "2022-06-13T22:55:22.990Z"
		}
	]
}
```

resources.name: Get exchanges
resources.description:
This route is used to get all exchanges.

## Restrictions
Exchanges must be VISIBLE and COMPLETE.

## Params  
page: Specifies the number of page to request in order to use pagination.

```response:200
{
	"ok": true,
	"page": 1,
	"pages": 1,
	"count": 1,
	"exchanges": [
		{
			"exchange": {
				"_id": "62a96014759cfdf3d683d9a2",
				"user_id": "62a933d951de9591c78e4677",
				"post_id": "62a7c16b5c5e9bf2ecb35aff",
				"req_description": "Solicitud de intercambio 3",
				"title": "Este es el primer reto completado",
				"description": "Pasos a seguir...",
				"materials": "Materiales....",
				"steps": "Pasos....",
				"image": "./uploads/62a933d951de9591c78e4677/2022-06-15T05-29-22.440Zminions.jpg",
				"likes": [
					"62a933d951de9591c78e4677"
				],
				"status": 4,
				"visibility": 1,
				"createdAt": "2022-06-15T04:29:08.924Z",
				"updatedAt": "2022-06-15T05:29:26.767Z"
			},
```
